content: ***this is a listing for a pdf printable pattern not a finished product**** i m so excited to introduce you to fiona the flamingo she is a larger version of the mini flamingo that can be found in my etsy shop or on the graceandyarn com blog she still works up super quickly and is a joy to make change the colors and you can also have a beautiful swan in a standing position and using the specified size yarn and hook below your finished flamingo will be approximately 15 inches tall you will want to be familiar with working in a magic_ring and using invisible decreases you can find the free version for this pattern and a full tips to learning amigurumi tutorial on my blog www graceandyarn com this listing is for the ad-free printable version skill level easy/intermediate - this is a beginner friendly pattern with some sewing of parts materials you will need size 4 worsted weight yarn 125g of pink small amount of white grey and beige 3 5 mm crochet hook 12mm safety eyes black crochet/embroidery thread for eyelashes optional scissors tapestry needle stuffing stitch markers us abbreviations used mc- magic_ring single_crochet- single_crochet single_crochet increase- single_crochet increase inv decrease- invisible decrease st s - stitch es slip_stitch slip_stitch you may make items to sell gift or donate with this pattern if you sell online please provide a link back to my website for credit as the designer www graceandyarn com you may not sell make copies or share the actual pattern thank you these patterns and more are available for free on my blog at www graceandyarn com this listing is for an ad-free printable version with a full photo tutorial thank you for stopping by
